event.title: is named for the Santa Fe Railroad (now

data.event: It is named for the Santa Fe Railroad (now part of BNSF Railway) which runs through the town alongside State Highway 6.

event.title: 1877, the Gulf, Colorado and Santa Fe Railway was built

data.event: In 1877, the Gulf, Colorado and Santa Fe Railway was built through the western part of Galveston county.

event.title: the turn of the century, three small, unincorporated towns had formed

data.event: By the turn of the century, three small, unincorporated towns had formed along the railway: Alta Loma, Arcadia and Algoa.

event.title: had harbored an intense rivalry for decades

data.event: Hitchcock was culturally very different, and Santa Fe and Hitchcock sports teams had harbored an intense rivalry for decades.
